entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Charlevoix
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:57 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Charlevoix 11:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
Temperature: -6.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -7.4°C
Wind: SW 20 km/h gust 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Risk of snow squalls late this afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 11 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning then snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
